## SelectionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SelectionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [attr](./d3.selectionoptions.attr.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: any; } | This is a map of ad-hoc attrs to apply to the selection. |
|  [classed](./d3.selectionoptions.classed.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: any; } | Map of ad-hoc classes to add or remove from the selection. |
|  [on](./d3.selectionoptions.on.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: any; } | This is a map of event handlers to apply to the selection. |
|  [style](./d3.selectionoptions.style.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: any; } | Map of ad-hoc styles to add or remove from the selection. |
